name: Time Raid
description:
Time Raid is a turn-based fighting game in which your ship has been thrown back in time. It's up to you to find the missing Time Gems, which will get you and your crew home.

**Unfortunately I didn't get to finish this game, so it was rushed at the end with some levels removed and others altered.

Controls

Mouse for Clicking on Weapons / Opponents

or

1, 2, 3, 4 - Weapons (Standard, Special, Health and Shields)

M - Turn Music on/off

Have fun!

Coded by Sikosis - http://games.sikosis.com/
